Quasar:




"I'm not sure what I can do yet, sir." Quasar said to Hell 
Beast. "But I'll try what I can. Where is he?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Inferno looked at Quasar, "We will have the glory of fighting 
back the 
> Rebel invaders when they strike, if they do." He said, and then 
marched away 
> as Hell Beast approached Quasar.
>     "Would you be so kind as to help Tarantulas with the computer 
system he 
> has access to. Its not the main uplink, but gives us access to 
simple, but 
> important, ship functions." He said, with a sly smile on his 
face. "Are you 
> formatted for technical operations, or are you more formatted for 
conflict 
> situations?"
